name: Match Tree
storyline:
It's a match tree game. A fresh approach. Meet the Pixie, the Gnome and the Witch and build them homes.

You combine flowers, carrots and trees.
But be aware of the SHEEP!

The fairy leaves new flowers on every location she touches.

You can win, when you create the needed object (shown on the upper center)
Some maps have events that get triggered by the points you collect while matching.

It's a game we tinker with and updating regularly.
